agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Elections TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, April 1, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Stephanie Klick HB 2586 Leach Relating to direct campaign expenditures by political committees. HB 2898 Fierro Relating to voting outside of the polling place. HB 2902 Fierro Relating to the use of e-mail on a vote by mail application. HB 2903 Fierro Relating to voter registration applications. HB 3044 Klick Relating to political expenditures made by a corporation to finance the solicitation of political contributions to a political committee. HB 3233 Klick Relating to the Judicial Campaign Fairness Act. HB 3580 Klick Relating to the revision or repeal of certain obsolete provisions related to restrictions on political advertising, political contributions, and political expenditures. HB 4447 Cain Relating to timely public inspection of early voting rosters. HJR 121 Nevárez | et al. Applying to the Congress of the United States to call a convention under Article V of the United States Constitution for the limited purpose of proposing an amendment to the United States Constitution to ensure balance, integrity, and transparency in our national campaign finance system. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
